properties.name: Funk/Hip-Hop Classes
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin  37 Nationalway Ballwin, MO 63011(By JSone) Ok, here it is: I will be teaching classes starting the 6th of Feb. They will be from 8:30-9:30PM on Mondays and 7:00-8:00 on Wednesdays. Monday will be a little more advanced, but beginners will fit in just as well. They will be at Beutel Dance Center at Manchester and 141 in the Office Depot shopping center. The prices are as follows: 5 for one class 5 for 5 classes, 3 per class 00 for 10 classes, 0 per class @ Beutel Dance Center 37 Nationalway Shopping Ballwin, MO 63011 My Background: I have been dancing for about 6 years now. I have focused the last three primarily on funkstyles. I have formal training from each of the Electric Boogaloos, the group that originated and innovated popping. They have taught many others including Michael Jackson and Usher.

properties.name: Hip Hop International Presents World Battle – B-boy Championship July 27-30, 2006
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinManhattan Beach, CA 90266 2006 World Battle – B-boy Championship Hip Hop International proudly introduces the World Battle a B-boying competition for the world’s top B-boy crews. The World Battle will be conducted Sunday, July 30 in Los Angeles, California in conjunction with the 2006 USA and World Hip Hop Championships July 27-30. USA and International crews of 4 to 6 members (any combination of b-boys/b-girls) are invited to enter the World Battle. How to enter If you’ve got a B-boy/B-girl crew, you’re eligible. Complete and send in the registration form today. When – Sunday, July 30 Registration - 9:00am Doors Open – 11:00am World Battle Begins - 12:noon Celebration Party - Midnight Registered crews not present at 12:00noon are subject to disqualification. Event Location Manhattan Beach Marriott 1400 Parkview Avenue Manhattan Beach, CA 90266 Event Description Straight Battle – Crews of 4 to 6– Plus Funk Room with Don “Campbellock” Campbell and Boogaloo Sam, Panel Discussion, Special Guests and DJs Who will be battling Crews from around the USA and the World Prizes 000 in cash and prizes – (minimum 000 cash). World Battle Champs (top three positions) will be invited to World Battle 2007. Entry Fee 5 per crewmember – includes registration fee, official t-shirt and celebration after party (does not include entry to the USA/World Hip Hop Championships). Producers Hip Hop International – Visit www.hiphopinternational.com for complete details or call 323.850.3777 Battle Coordinator and Head Judge POEONE – For battle details contact POEONE at GSeveneleven@aol.com Judges The judges’ panel will consist of 3 to 5 members. Only highly qualified judges with experience and credibility in the B-boy/B-girl community will be selected. Judging criteria The “World Battle” is a straight battle; crew vs. crew. Participants are judged on their demonstration and performance of the essential foundations of B-boying and B-girling consisting of top rock, up rock, legwork, footwork, power moves, freezes as well as the following: Style - feeling or expressing the moves, “flava”, the manner in which you present Character – self-expression, facial reactions, demonstrating feelings Originality – individual presence and style, being different Smoothness – very clean in presentation and go down no slips, falls, stuttering, rough edges or being stuck in a move Difficult combinations – self-explanatory Execution – perform the moves with correct body placement and technique Musicality – perform the moves in time with the music; correctly utilizing the music and dance Energy – Exhibiting strong and exciting physical presence Creativity – bringing something new to the dance more than the basics Teamwork – working in collaboration with each other; good chemistry among the crewmembers Low number of repeat moves – do not repeat the same set or combination of moves Rules and Regulations  Crews consist of at least 4 members and not more than 6 members and may be any age or gender.  Based on the total number of crews entered, qualifying rounds of five (5) minutes each will be conducted to narrow the field of competition to the top 16 crews.  Two (2) crews will battle at a time to determine who advances to the next round  The top 16 crews selected will battle in the preliminary rounds, each lasting six (6) minutes until the final four crews have been chosen.  The final four crews will battle in the two (2) semifinal rounds each 10 minutes to determine the top two crews.  The top two crews will battle in a 20-minute round for the “World Battle” title.  The World Battle is not divided into age divisions. There is no age requirement.  Physical contact in battles will not be tolerated and may result in a disqualification or a deduction in score of the crew or crews involved.  Inappropriate sexual gestures are not advised.  All music will be selected by the competition DJ.  Order of appearance of crews throughout the battle are determined by the judge panel.  Three to five judges will officiate.  Individual crewmembers may only compete on one crew. Accommodations – special rates are available at the following hotels* Host Hotel - Manhattan Beach Marriott 310.546.7511 Alternate Hotels: Summerfield Suites by Wyndham 310-725-0100 Ayres Hotel Manhattan Beach 310.536.0400 Hawthorn Suites Manhattan Beach 310.546.8942 Marriott Residence Inn 310.421.3103 Hacienda Hotel at LAX 310.615.0015 *When making your hotel reservation tell them you are with the championship to receive the special rates. __________________

properties.name: Iowa bboy Practice spot in Ames
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin198 Forker What: Practice spot in Ames When:Every Thursday! From 5:00PM - 8:00PM + longer Who: Everybody from everywhere Where: 198 Forker Building, Ames, Iowa (It\'s on campus) Why: Because it\'s fun! Directions: From I-35, take the 13th Street exit and go west on 13th street(towards Ames) Keep heading west until you see a field on your left with horses and stuff, and then take a left on Haber. Go straight and through the tunnel, turn right coming out of the tunnel. Take a left at the lights. Keep going straight. At the stop sign, go straight then take your first left. That\'s the buildling. Starting at 5:30PM, you won\'t get a ticket. The room is located downstairs, just as you enter the building, just head down stairs, take your left, then left again and go straight to the studio there.

properties.name: POEONE & KoolSki Present Steady Rocking.
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinOrange, Ca. 92868 1200 W. Alvarez Ave. POEONE & KoolSki Present Steady Rocking. Lets Bring Back The Cyphers Yall, Once a month, for the rest of the year 2006. This jam is dedicated to the Cyphers. We want to see everybody just have a good time and dance all night. If you want to call someone out then do it. No judges, No Time Limits. Just straight raw BBOYing. The way its supposed to be done, In the Circles! We want to end the so called bboys that only enter a jam when theres only a big cash prize. We want everybody to represent because they want to show what SKILLZ they have. And because they just want to out do the next man. And most of all," BECAUSE THEY LOVE THE ART OF BBOYING!!!" We will be giving 2 trophies two the BBoy or Bgirl who reps the most that night. Money comes and goes, BUT Trophies last forever. We value the ones we have. So just come a show your soul yall. And lets celebrate this art that we call B-BOYING. Peace. Location: Youth A Flame 1200 W. Alvarez Ave. Orange, Ca. 92868 www.youthAflame.com Time: 7:00 P.M. Till ?????? (Time stays the same for all dates.) Cost: .00 at door. Djs: To be announced. Or who ever wants to come a rep this dope celebration. DatesOnce a month for the rest of the year 2006.) June 1st. July 13th. August 31st. September 28th. October 26th. November 30th. December 14th. We end till next year. No Video Cameras!! THIS ONES FOR THE MENTAL YALL!!!!!!! For more info contact POEONE: poeone@poeone.com thankyou To All The Sponcers that supported and to Youth A Flame for all the support they give to the Hiphop Culture. PEACE POEONE & KoolSki.

properties.name: San Diego Practice spots
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin San Diegoby:takuwan619 Monday Otay Recreation Center Main Street, Chula Vista Time: 6:00/7:30 - 9:45 Hot Monkey Love 5960 El Cajon Blvd. San Diego, CA 92115 619-582-5908 cover...all ages UCSD Main Gym Time: 9:30 - 11:00 Contact UCSD\'s Body Rock Club for details. Inquire about BBoy Babak\'s class Tuesday Culture Shock Dance Studio 2110 Hancock Street, Suite 200 Time: 8:30 - 11:00 Inquire about Optic\'s and Saso\'s bboy classes Cost: .00 Wednesday Otay Recreation Center Main Street, Chula Vista Time: 6:00 - 9:45 Thursday Dance Factory Encinitas Blvd, Encinitas Time: 8:30 - 10:00 Cost: .00 The Bus Stop Martini Ranch (Downtown) F st. and 6th 21 and up Time: Late Evening UCSD Main Gym Time: 9:30 - 11:00 Contact UCSD\'s Body Rock Club for details. Inquire about BBoy Babak\'s class Palomar Time: 6:00 - 8:00 Contact Bboy Wonderbread @ hiphopsftsoldier@aim.com Friday Moreno Club Moreno Blvd. Usually starts poppin around 11 or 12, not too much room, but they cater to the bboys there, great atmosphere. Saturday Bar Dynamite - Gets really really crowded, ciphers are really rare unless the Beat Puppets are there. good music. AC Lounge- Tough crowd. doesnt feel like the right environment to get down for some reason...for me at least. Landlord Jim\'s- good music some nights. not much room to really jam, but when the musics good...cant help doing some top rockin. Moreno Club Usually starts poppin around 11 or 12, not too much room, but they cater to the bboys there, great atmosphere. Sunday Reggae Night Martini Ranch (Downtown) F st. and 6th 21 and up Time: Late Evening There may be some other practices out there that I did not list, especially those that go down during the day time. If anyone knows of any practice spots I left out dont be afraid to post them. Again...21 and up check out Morena Club, Bar Dynamite, Red C Lounge, Air Condition Lounge, Rock Bottom (its cheap!). If you are a member of 24-Hour Fitness, you may catch some bboys at the downtown location, Hillcrest (nice floor) or at the East H street location. Done...Peace

There will also be a Masters Workshop taught by ABSTRAK that weekend! check out www.skillmethodz.com, www.swoonunit.com, www.raleighmusichall.com for more info! schizophrenic octopus!!!!! properties.name: TORONTO FUNKSTYLES DROP IN for 2006
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin 427 Bloor St. WestTORONTO FUNKSTYLES DROP IN’ New Dropin Dates for 2006 It’s a place where Poppers and Lockers can meet and get down. Our dropin is once a month. This is not a class it’s just a get down session; beginners are welcome to come to the dropin. We will remain having classes at another time. Dropins are twice a month now take a look at the dropin schedule down below: New Dropin Dates: Saturday, March 11, 2006 3:30pm 6:30pm 3 HRS Saturday, March 25, 2006 3:30pm 5:30pm 2 HRS Saturday, April 1, 2006 3:30pm till 6:30pm 3 HRS Saturday, April 15, 2006 3:30pm till 6:30pm 3 HRS Saturday, May 13, 2006 3:30pm till 6:30pm 3 HRS Saturday, May 27, 2006 3:30 till 6:30pm 3 HRS Saturday, June 10, 2006 3:30 till 6:30pm 3 HRS Saturday, June 24, 2006 3:30 till 6:30pm 3 HRS Cost :00 Each Drop in to cover the room cost. 3 hours to get down. ***LOCATION*** Trinity St. Paul’s (church) centre 427 Bloor St. West Downtown Toronto Main intersection: Spadina and Bloor. Across from the Domminion food store

properties.name: UPDATES: Bboy Summit 2006-B.O.S.S. Jam
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisinlos angelesNo Easy Props Presents: B.O.S.S. JAM "Battle Of The Sexes Super Jam" August 31-September 3, 2006 The Bboy Summit, legendary renowned trendsetter in Hip-Hop lifestyle events and culture is proud to present the Battle of the Sexes Super Jam Event. No Easy Props, producers of the Bboy Summit Event, desire to bridge the gap, unify and strengthen the Hip-Hop community, has combined forces with other well known events: Bboy Masters/Pro-Am (Miami, FL); Alien Ness/The Octagon (NY,CA,VA); Funk Styles (Vegas); Ken Swift/Break Life Uprock Convention (NY); and The Day Before Hip-Hop (SF) to make the ultimate Super Jam. All of this will be toped off with the Battle of the Sexes, an international country vs. country battle for world domination. ***Dance Class Workshops*** Mon-Fri. Daytime More TBA Thu. Aug. 31st: BOSS Theatre 2pm-10pm Hip-Hop Filmfest 2pm-5pm Hip-Hop Dance Panel 6pm-7pm Day Before Hip-Hop (Bay Area’s Story) 8pm DJ 9pm *Afterparty Fri. Sept. 2nd: BOSS Jam 6pm-Midnight Bgirl Sitdown Panel/We Bgirlz Booksigning 6:30pm-8:30 Footwork Challenge 9pm DJ *Afterparty Freestyle Session/Armory Sat. Sept. 3rd: Bboy Summit 1pm-8pm Room 1/Room 2 BreakLife Seven Gems Up Rock Convention 2-4pm Funk Styles Uprock Panel 2pm Apache Line 3pm BGirl Twosomes Battle 4pm Country vs. Country Battle 5pm *Afterparty Sun. Sept. 4th: Bboy Summit 1pm-8pm Room 1/Room 2 Octagon 1pm Funk Styles Pro Am 4pm Crew battle 5pm Choreography category 7pm *Afterparty Vendor Information 000/Booth includes: -Booth for Saturday & Sunday, August 2nd & 3rd. (Possibly one more day but not confirmed yet. ) -One 10x10 table & 2 chairs. -Admission for 2 people to the events. -Setup times: Saturday 10AM/Sunday 11AM. -Deset Saturday by 7:30 PM/Sunday by 7 PM. Payment -00 Due in advance (To be received by August 15th) -00 Due upon 1st day of setup (Saturday, August 2nd) Please make checks payable to: No Easy Props Production 2031 N. Hoover St. Los Angeles, CA. 90027 VENDOR CONTACT: nychyna@optonline.net

properties.name: United Styles Pt 2 and Floorlords 25th Anniversary!!!!!!!!!!
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinBoston, MAEveryone get ready for the first weekend of August (August 4th, 5th, 6th) We got United Styles pt 2, Hip Hop Reconstruction Concert, and The Floorlords 25th Aniversary all in the same weekend in Boston. August 4th, 2006 United Styles 2 The 5 on 5 crew battle at United Styles 2 for 500 will feature Skill Methodz (United Styles 1 Champions) Flo Mo (Finland) Flava Squad (MA,NY,CA) Rock So Fresh (CA) Streetmasters (FL) Zulu Kingz (USA) Aerobatz Skeletonz (FL) Phaze II (IL) Location: Jorge Hernandez Cultural Center 85 West Newton St Boston, MA Admission: 0 Time: 7-12am August 5th, 2006 Hip Hop Reconstruction Concert The finalist of the United Styles crew battle will battle in the finals at the Hip Hop Reconstruction Concert in front 30,000 people. Which will feature many national and local hip hop artist Location: City Hall Plaza in Boston Admission: Free Time: 4-8pm August 6th, 2006 Floorlord\'s 25th Anniversary 2 on 2 popping battle for 500 Bboy of the night for 00 Bboy crew who represents the most for 000 Location: TBA Admission:5 Time: 3-9 pm Dj\'s for the 3 events: Dj Renegade (UK), Dj Just 1 (UK), Dj Timber (UK) Dj Kon (MA), Dj Forrest Getem Gump (NY), Dj Ninja Bee (MA), Dj Lean Rock (MA), Dj Lazeboy (MA), Dj Safire (MA)

properties.name: ZERO GRAVITY 5
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinSyracuse, NY ZERO GRAVITY INC. & ZERO GRAVITY FRANCE Presents... ZERO GRAVITY 5 2 vs 2 International Breakdance Championship Date: Mid September (TBA) Location: Syracuse, NY OPEN REGISTRATION AVAILABLE 2 vs 2 Breakance Battles (32 slots) :: WINNER GETS $ 1200 CASH ATTENTION !! READ THIS !! RULE OF THE GAME !! The first round, you will be allowed to use only one crew combo routines. If you pass to the next round, the other rounds you won\'t be allowed to use crew routines till the end. This is to see how you can perform indiviually. It shows your true potential and generates a challenge within the tournement. In order to register for the 2 vs 2 event please email us at: zerogravity_usa@yahoo.com your email should include: - your full name - your bboy/bgirl name - your crew name - where you from Zero Gravity 5 also holds other events, they will be posted soon with further details. We got crews from France & the winners from the Zero Gravity France championships will be invited for this year\'s event (USA). We got special surprise battles and more... Stay tuned... __________________ props promoters of Zero Gravity jfsrocket@aol.com bboyprops82@msn.com
